## Step-by-Step

üßæ Click the Read button to filter messages that have already been read.

üìÑ Review the messages to revisit important updates or conversations.

üîç Use the search bar to quickly find specific read messages by keywords.

üßæ If needed, you can mark a message as unread to revisit it later or trigger notifications.

::div{class="flex w-full justify-center max-w-6xl mx-auto h-130 py-4"}
:video{src="/read.mp4" class="rounded-md object-cover w-full h-full" controls autoplay muted loop}
::


### üí°Tips

* Use the Read section to review past activity and ensure nothing important is overlooked.

* Combine with Pinned Dots to reference frequently needed messages quickly.

* The search feature in the Read section can save time when looking for older messages.
